alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 7:52AM EST until February 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock affecting Garrard and Jessamine Counties. Kentucky River at Lockport Lock affecting Owen, Carroll and Henry Counties. .Heavy rain from earlier this week will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 29.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 28.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: A Flood Advisory means minor flooding is possible and rivers are forecast to exceed bankfull. If you are in the advisory area remain alert to possible flooding, or the possibility of the advisory being upgraded to a warning. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued by midday Sunday.
